dict.string: The path to the matlab executable on your system (change this to be correct0 Don't mess with this This is the datatask file that contains the input information Extract the data out of the datatask file in the form of a 3d path series The resolution parameter - higher value will lead to a partition into smaller communities. The temporal parameter - higher value will lead to nodes more likely to stay in same cluster Here, convert to a 3d point set - modify as needed if you only want a subset of points Convert the input times into time bins This module converts the 3d point series data into a (dense) weighted adjacency matrix Set below to the run that you want to show in the plot
